## Analysis / Dataviz

```{r, analysis}
dat <- tibble(x = 1:10, y = 21:30, z = 21:30,a = 21:30,f = 21:30,g = 21:30,l = 21:30) %>% 
  mutate(fuck = x * y) %>% 
  mutate(lol = x * f) %>% 
  mutate(lol2 = x * f) %>% 
  mutate(lol3 = x * f)

dat$ldkf <- 500
dat$ldkf <- 500
dat$ldkf <- 500

dat %>% 
  mutate(fuck = x * y) %>% 
  mutate(lol = x * f) %>% 
  select(x, y, z)

```
